channel.title: CVE Feed for Zscaler -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Zscaler -- all products

item.title: CVE-2021-26734|2024-09-17T13:46:22.720Z -- zscaler -- client%20connector
item.description: Zscaler Client Connector Installer on Windows before version 3.4.0.124 improperly handled directory junctions during uninstallation. A local adversary may be able to delete folders in an elevated context.

item.title: CVE-2024-23463|2024-08-29T19:20:46.517Z -- zscaler -- client%20connector
item.description: Anti-tampering protection of the Zscaler Client Connector can be bypassed under certain conditions when running the Repair App functionality. This affects Zscaler Client Connector on Windows prior to 4.2.1

item.title: CVE-2024-23458|2024-08-06T18:36:26.478Z -- zscaler -- client%20connector
item.description: While copying individual autoupdater log files, reparse point check was missing which could result into crafted attacks, potentially leading to a local privilege escalation. This issue affects Zscaler Client Connector on Windows <4.2.0.190.

item.title: CVE-2024-23483|2024-08-06T18:08:53.764Z -- zscaler -- client%20connector
item.description: An Improper Input Validation vulnerability in Zscaler Client Connector on MacOS allows OS Command Injection. This issue affects Zscaler Client Connector on MacOS <4.2.

item.title: CVE-2024-23456|2024-08-06T15:44:01.045Z -- zscaler -- client%20connector
item.description: Anti-tampering can be disabled under certain conditions without signature validation. This affects Zscaler Client Connector <4.2.0.190 with anti-tampering enabled.

item.title: CVE-2024-23483|2024-08-06T15:30:51.851Z -- zscaler -- client%20connector
item.description: An Improper Input Validation vulnerability in Zscaler Client Connector on MacOS allows OS Command Injection. This issue affects Zscaler Client Connector on MacOS <4.2.

item.title: CVE-2024-23460|2024-08-06T15:29:26.050Z -- zscaler -- client%20connector
item.description: The Zscaler Updater process does not validate the digital signature of the installer before execution, allowing arbitrary code to be locally executed. This affects Zscaler Client Connector on MacOS <4.2.

item.title: CVE-2023-28806|2024-08-06T15:41:01.883Z -- zscaler -- client%20connector
item.description: An Improper Validation of signature in Zscaler Client Connector on Windows allows an authenticated user to disable anti-tampering. This issue affects Client Connector on Windows <4.2.0.190.

item.title: CVE-2024-23458|2024-08-06T15:22:58.963Z -- zscaler -- client%20connector
item.description: While copying individual autoupdater log files, reparse point check was missing which could result into crafted attacks, potentially leading to a local privilege escalation. This issue affects Zscaler Client Connector on Windows <4.2.0.190.

item.title: CVE-2024-23464|2024-08-06T15:41:17.867Z -- zscaler -- client%20connector
item.description: In certain cases, Zscaler Internet Access (ZIA) can be disabled by PowerShell commands with admin rights. This affects Zscaler Client Connector on Windows <4.2.1

item.title: CVE-2023-41973|2024-08-05T20:42:20.380Z -- zscaler -- client%20connector
item.description: ZSATray passes the previousInstallerName as a config parameter to TrayManager, and TrayManager constructs the path and appends previousInstallerName to get the full path of the exe. Fixed Version: Win ZApp 4.3.0.121 and later.

item.title: CVE-2023-41972|2024-08-05T20:54:13.482Z -- zscaler -- client%20connector
item.description: In some rare cases, there is a password type validation missing in Revert Password check and for some features it could be disabled. Fixed Version: Win ZApp 4.3.0.121 and later.

item.title: CVE-2023-41970|2024-08-02T19:09:49.453Z -- zscaler -- client%20connector
item.description: An Improper Validation of Integrity Check Value vulnerability in Zscaler Client Connector on Windows during the Repair App functionality may allow Local Execution of Code.This issue affects Client Connector on Windows: before 4.1.0.62.

item.title: CVE-2023-41973|2024-08-02T19:09:49.463Z -- zscaler -- client%20connector
item.description: ZSATray passes the previousInstallerName as a config parameter to TrayManager, and TrayManager constructs the path and appends previousInstallerName to get the full path of the exe. Fixed Version: Win ZApp 4.3.0.121 and later.

item.title: CVE-2023-41969|2024-08-02T19:09:49.353Z -- zscaler -- client%20connector
item.description: An arbitrary file deletion in ZSATrayManager where it protects the temporary encrypted ZApp issue reporting file from the unprivileged end user access and modification. Fixed version: Win ZApp 4.3.0 and later.

item.title: CVE-2023-41972|2024-08-02T19:09:49.373Z -- zscaler -- client%20connector
item.description: In some rare cases, there is a password type validation missing in Revert Password check and for some features it could be disabled. Fixed Version: Win ZApp 4.3.0.121 and later.

item.title: CVE-2023-41971|2024-08-02T19:09:49.420Z -- zscaler -- client%20connector
item.description: An Improper Link Resolution Before File Access ('Link Following') vulnerability in Zscaler Client Connector on Windows allows a system file to be overwritten.This issue affects Client Connector on Windows: before 3.7.

item.title: CVE-2023-28798|2024-08-02T13:51:38.162Z -- zscaler -- client%20connector
item.description: An out-of-bounds write to heap in the pacparser library on Zscaler Client Connector on Mac may lead to arbitrary code execution.

item.title: CVE-2024-23457|2024-06-14T18:59:34.369Z -- zscaler -- client%20connector
item.description: The anti-tampering functionality of the Zscaler Client Connector can be disabled under certain conditions when an uninstall password is enforced. This affects Zscaler Client Connector on Windows prior to 4.2.0.209

item.title: CVE-2024-23461|2024-06-04T17:45:51.383Z -- zscaler -- client%20connector
item.description: An Improper Validation of Integrity Check Value vulnerability in Zscaler Client Connector on MacOS during the upgrade process may allow a Local Execution of Code.This issue affects Client Connector on MacOS: before 3.4.

item.title: CVE-2024-23482|2024-03-26T14:23:20.100Z -- zscaler -- client%20connector
item.description: The ZScaler service is susceptible to a local privilege escalation vulnerability found in the ZScalerService process. Fixed Version: Mac ZApp 4.2.0.241 and later.

item.title: CVE-2024-23457|2024-05-01T16:26:11.546Z -- zscaler -- client%20connector
item.description: The anti-tampering functionality of the Zscaler Client Connector can be disabled under certain conditions when an uninstall password is enforced. This affects Zscaler Client Connector on Windows prior to 4.2.0.209

item.title: CVE-2024-23462|2024-05-02T13:11:38.955Z -- zscaler -- client%20connector
item.description: An Improper Validation of Integrity Check Value vulnerability in Zscaler Client Connector on MacOS allows a denial of service of the Client Connector binary and thus removing client functionality.This issue affects Client Connector on MacOS: before 3.4.

item.title: CVE-2024-23459|2024-06-06T14:06:49.511Z -- zscaler -- client%20connector
item.description: An Improper Link Resolution Before File Access ('Link Following') vulnerability in Zscaler Client Connector on Mac allows a system file to be overwritten.This issue affects Zscaler Client Connector on Mac : before 3.7.

item.title: CVE-2024-23463|2024-04-30T16:17:53.710Z -- zscaler -- client%20connector
item.description: Anti-tampering protection of the Zscaler Client Connector can be bypassed under certain conditions when running the Repair App functionality. This affects Zscaler Client Connector on Windows prior to 4.2.1

item.title: CVE-2024-23480|2024-06-06T14:07:07.568Z -- zscaler -- client%20connector
item.description: A fallback mechanism in code sign checking on macOS may allow arbitrary code execution. This issue affects Zscaler Client Connector on MacOS prior to 4.2.

item.title: CVE-2023-41969|2024-03-26T14:14:21.872Z -- zscaler -- client%20connector
item.description: An arbitrary file deletion in ZSATrayManager where it protects the temporary encrypted ZApp issue reporting file from the unprivileged end user access and modification. Fixed version: Win ZApp 4.3.0 and later.

item.title: CVE-2023-41973|2024-03-26T14:19:13.244Z -- zscaler -- client%20connector
item.description: ZSATray passes the previousInstallerName as a config parameter to TrayManager, and TrayManager constructs the path and appends previousInstallerName to get the full path of the exe. Fixed Version: Win ZApp 4.3.0.121 and later.

item.title: CVE-2023-41972|2024-03-26T14:16:29.405Z -- zscaler -- client%20connector
item.description: In some rare cases, there is a password type validation missing in Revert Password check and for some features it could be disabled. Fixed Version: Win ZApp 4.3.0.121 and later.

item.title: CVE-2023-41971|2024-05-02T13:11:07.860Z -- zscaler -- client%20connector
item.description: An Improper Link Resolution Before File Access ('Link Following') vulnerability in Zscaler Client Connector on Windows allows a system file to be overwritten.This issue affects Client Connector on Windows: before 3.7.

item.title: CVE-2023-41970|2024-06-04T17:21:59.125Z -- zscaler -- client%20connector
item.description: An Improper Validation of Integrity Check Value vulnerability in Zscaler Client Connector on Windows during the Repair App functionality may allow Local Execution of Code.This issue affects Client Connector on Windows: before 4.1.0.62.

item.title: CVE-2023-28798|2024-06-04T17:28:57.869Z -- zscaler -- client%20connector
item.description: An out-of-bounds write to heap in the pacparser library on Zscaler Client Connector on Mac may lead to arbitrary code execution.

item.title: CVE-2024-23462|2024-07-17T15:08:35.249Z -- zscaler -- client%20connector
item.description: An Improper Validation of Integrity Check Value vulnerability in Zscaler Client Connector on MacOS allows a denial of service of the Client Connector binary and thus removing client functionality.This issue affects Client Connector on MacOS: before 3.4.

item.title: CVE-2024-23482|2024-08-05T14:40:13.211Z -- zscaler -- client%20connector
item.description: The ZScaler service is susceptible to a local privilege escalation vulnerability found in the ZScalerService process. Fixed Version: Mac ZApp 4.2.0.241 and later.

item.title: CVE-2023-41969|2024-08-06T14:41:26.303Z -- zscaler -- client%20connector
item.description: An arbitrary file deletion in ZSATrayManager where it protects the temporary encrypted ZApp issue reporting file from the unprivileged end user access and modification. Fixed version: Win ZApp 4.3.0 and later.

item.title: CVE-2023-41971|2024-08-06T17:51:01.988Z -- zscaler -- client%20connector
item.description: An Improper Link Resolution Before File Access ('Link Following') vulnerability in Zscaler Client Connector on Windows allows a system file to be overwritten.This issue affects Client Connector on Windows: before 3.7.

item.title: CVE-2023-28806|2024-08-06T17:30:31.651Z -- zscaler -- client%20connector
item.description: An Improper Validation of signature in Zscaler Client Connector on Windows allows an authenticated user to disable anti-tampering. This issue affects Client Connector on Windows <4.2.0.190.

item.title: CVE-2024-23460|2024-08-06T20:06:58.896Z -- zscaler -- client%20connector
item.description: The Zscaler Updater process does not validate the digital signature of the installer before execution, allowing arbitrary code to be locally executed. This affects Zscaler Client Connector on MacOS <4.2.
